title: DNS records
extract: Types of DNS RecordsA Record. An A record is what points your domain to an IP address. ... CNAME. CNAME, or canonical name, redirects one domain to another, allowing you to only update one A record each time you make a change. ... MX Entry. ... TXT Records. ... AAAA Record.Jan 28, 2018
extract_html:
Types of DNS Records
  • A Record. An A record is what points your domain to an IP address. ...
  • CNAME. CNAME, or canonical name, redirects one domain to another, allowing you to only update one A record each time you make a change. ...
  • MX Entry. ...
  • TXT Records. ...
  • AAAA Record.
Jan 28, 2018
